sub_title: MA in translation of Dutch-English (both directions). Looking for position as in-house translator/editor.
summary:
With an MA degree in translation of the language pair Dutch-English (both directions), I have several years of experience working as a freelance translator and language tutor, and am working in the field of communication/translation/localization at LocalEyes Ltd. 

I would describe myself as detail oriented and creative with languages. I have experience with deadline-driven project-based work and enjoy improving communication. 

My personal interests include reading, travel, sports and photography.
